plot: After taking a picture of J, a girl that he likes, H tries to keep track of his failed relationship with K, his current girlfriend, through the Polaroids that he constantly takes.
title: Sentimental Polaroid
plot_es: After taking a picture of J, a girl that he likes, H tries to keep track of his failed relationship with K, his current girlfriend, through the Polaroids that he constantly takes.
plot_en: After taking a picture of J, a girl that he likes, H tries to keep track of his failed relationship with K, his current girlfriend, through the Polaroids that he constantly takes.
